item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 30, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Breaking the 4Chan CAPTCHA (238 points | 119 comments)
3. The Quake III Arena Bot (2001) [pdf] (18 points | 9 comments)

6. Brick and Mortar Triangle Fraud (66 points | 30 comments)
7. What does this button do? – My new car has a mysterious and undocumented switch (291 points | 192 comments)
8. The Influence of Bell Labs (108 points | 57 comments)
9. The Deterioration of Google (163 points | 85 comments)
10. Lessons from 15 Years of Indie App Development (37 points | 6 comments)
11. The Hall SC-VGA-2 Video Processor, the Atari ST and NeXTSTEP (25 points | 4 comments)
12. Understanding SIMD: Infinite complexity of trivial problems (138 points | 55 comments)
13. Jank is now running on LLVM IR (66 points | 13 comments)
14. Everything You Never Wanted to Know About Linker Script (2021) (16 points | 2 comments)
15. NASA's Europa Clipper: Miles Down, Instruments Deploying (47 points | 11 comments)

20. Rust: Tools (early access edition) (47 points | 33 comments)

22. TfL abandons plans for driverless tube trains (26 points | 32 comments)
23. How We Got the Lithium-Ion Battery (67 points | 19 comments)
24. Chinese pebble-bed nuclear reactor passes "meltdown" test (127 points | 55 comments)
25. Core copyright violation moves ahead in The Intercept's lawsuit against OpenAI (200 points | 190 comments)
26. Ask HN: Platform for senior devs to learn other programming languages? (59 points | 25 comments)
27. Sieve (YC W22) Is Hiring Engineers to Build the Future of Video AI ( | hide)
28. Show HN: Vince – A self hosted alternative to Google Analytics (231 points | 66 comments)
29. Show HN: It took me 5() months to build a Plausible alternative (9 points | 10 comments)
